name: Mini Botnet
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN TO AVOID A WEIRD ZOOM

manage a network of hacked computer so that your evil AI can mine more bitcoins. you can connect the computers to allow them to send packages to each other. Each package delivery give you some bitcoin. The AI chose how to send the packages in the network but it is you who build that network. If a computer has too much work it decrease its mine rate and it can even trigger an antivirus that make you loose the game.

Game made during the Wowie Jam 4.0 (I only started on saturday evening and overscoped a little so the game is incomplete there is barely the minimum gameplay but feel free to leave feedback in the comment)
